root.name: Super Sidekicks 2: The World Championship
root.description: Gameplay Tournaments. Super sidekicks 2, the sequel to the original Super Sidekicks made a number of improvements on the original games design, including a smaller goal, the now taken for granted ability to change which player you were controlling at any time and Issues with long shots from the first title were corrected. The title retained its trademark feature of "chance shot" which at times would enable the player to enter a first person mode and aim a reticule at the goal indicating where the player wanted to aim their shot. The number of teams were increased to 48 and split into 6 groups. The main gameplay mode is a World cup tournament mode in which you get grouped with 4 other countries and progress in a round robin format to the quarter finals - semi finals and finally the world cup final Teams Europe A - England, Spain, Holland, Switzerland, Norway, Turkey, IrelandEurope B - France, Germany, Bulgaria, Sweden, Russia, Belgium, Greece, RomaniaAisia - South Korea, Japan, Saudi Arabia, Taiwan, China, Iran, Hong Kong, UAEAmericas - USA, Mexico, Canada, Australia, NZ,Costa Rica, El Salvidor, Honduras.South America - Brazil, Argentina, Paraguay, Columbia, Bolivia, Peru, EcuadorAfrica - Cameroon, Morocco, Nigeria, Egypt, South Africa, Ivory Coast, Zambia, Guinea
